p: Owing to its nutritional value, apple pomace and pear pomace are prone to be used in manufacturing food products. In addition to nutritional components, apple and pear pomace contains high levels of fiber and polyphenols, which are known to play an important role in human health [ 177]. Some established examples, include the incorporation of finely ground apple pomace in several bakery products [ 177, 178] or adding it to brown rice-based crackers [ 179].
